snippet: The footage provides a first look at how the “man in the hat” left the building right after the bombings, and where he went.
abstract: Belgian authorities release surveillance-camera video footage of suspect in Brussels Airport bombing, which tracks his movements for two hours following crime, in appeal to public for assistance in identifying him.

byline.contributor: Lilia Blaise contributed reporting from Paris, and Christina Anderson from Copenhagen.

lead_paragraph: The footage provides a first look at how the “man in the hat” left the building right after the bombings, and where he went.

headline.main: Belgian Police Release New Video of Brussels Airport Suspect
headline.print_headline: New Video Released of Suspect in Bombing of Brussels Airport
